solution_line_template: The short show has {short_show_episodes}*{short_show_duration_per_episode}=<<{short_show_episodes}*{short_show_duration_per_episode}={total_hours_short_show}>>{total_hours_short_show} hours of TV
So in total he watches {total_hours_short_show}+{total_hours_long_show}=<<{total_hours_short_show}+{total_hours_long_show}={total_hours_watched}>>{total_hours_watched} hours
